Just terrible.

hi guys! the south of brazil is currently being hit by a flood, one of the worst natural disasters in our country. more than 200.000 people have lost their homes and some of them don't even have water to drink anymore. brazilians are doing everything they can to help, but it's not enough. so, if you can, please help by donating or just spreading information for more people! all help is appreciated at the moment

in the picture, there's two options to donate, but here's another website for it: https://brazilfoundation.org/en/help-rio-grande-do-sul/

text:
These floods in southern Brazil are just awful.
Official death toll now at 78.
Photo: Reuters

🚨Hello Fortnite Community! I'm here to ask for your help with something that's happening in Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil!

The state of Rio Grande do Sul (RS) is currently facing heavy rains and the worst flood in its history. Currently, 75% of the state has been affected, and thousands of people have had their homes impacted and have nowhere to stay...

There are areas completely submerged, and unfortunately, we don't know when this will end or how many people will suffer losses :(

⚠ - Please help Rio Grande do Sul by donating or sharing the donation link below:
https://brazilfoundation.org/en/donate-now-funds/?donate=43836
